It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 42 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 43 44 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 45 inline void 46 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 47 resize_imp_reassign(entry_pointer p_e, entry_array a_entries_resized, 48 true_type) 49 { 50 key_const_reference r_key = PB_DS_V2F(p_e->m_value); 51 size_type hash = ranged_probe_fn_base::operator()(r_key, p_e->m_hash); 52 53 size_type i; 54 for (i = 0; i < m_num_e; ++i) 55 { 56 const size_type pos = ranged_probe_fn_base::operator()(r_key, hash, i); 57 entry_pointer p_new_e = a_entries_resized + pos; 58 switch(p_new_e->m_stat) 59 { 60 case empty_entry_status: 61 new (&p_new_e->m_value) value_type(p_e->m_value); 62 p_new_e->m_hash = hash; 63 p_new_e->m_stat = valid_entry_status; 64 return; 65 case erased_entry_status: 66 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERT(0); 67 break; 68 case valid_entry_status: 69 break; 70 default: 71 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERT(0); 72 }; 73 } 74 __throw_insert_error(); 75 } 76 77 #endif
